string-array.name: whats_new_items
string-array.item: Added feature to select multiple NFC tags that can dismiss an alarm.
Added speech rate to text-to-speech option to change the speed that it will speak.
Updated alarm card look to show buttons for dismiss options, snooze options, and regular alarm options.
Added custom vibration pattern option for alarms.
Added battery saver option to keep the screen off when an alarm is active. Found in Settings > General.
Added voice option to text-to-speech to choose which voice to use.
Fixed an issue with flashlight where it would only blink, not simply turn on and stay on.
